commands.name: voice-note
commands.title: Voice Note
commands.subtitle: Record and transcribe voice notes
commands.description: Record audio and get text transcription

preferences.name: openaiApiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key for using GPT and Whisper APIs

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
